Posts.Content: Hi G n J, Sorry but I’ve never joined a chat room forum before so not used to the format. I will definitely take a look at the pages via the link =  thank you. And yes the standard 15 sessions. And yes Stow as in Stowmarket.
Posts.Title: Due to start Radiotherapy shortly

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy 17/4 and after a Second op to remove a hemeatoma my scar has eventually healed enough to be referred for mycourz3 of radiotherapy. What side affects Cani expect?
Posts.Title: Due to start Radiotherapy shortly

Posts.Content: Oh wow! Like you say small world. I will be having RT at Ipswich hospital and I am lucky/unlucky enough to have a blue badge so shouldn5 have to pay for parking. Sorry if that’s a sore issue....(I dont mind paying but I do find it easier to park close to my destination). I have yet to get my appt for “plotting”. I have been lucky enough not to need chemo therapy. I hope J has successfully finished all  her treatment and that you have both come through the experience relatively well. Sue
